name: SORDID TEETH MEMORIES
description:
Certain things can happen only when there is no one to observe them. However, this doesn’t mean that events will always, without exception, not have a warped meaning. 

Ground in the dark where there are no more people. Looks like the place Noghily once saw on a postcard. It’s not too empty, thanks to the two carcases of giants. A while back, two creatures tried to eat the whole town but now this land is filled with bile. One of them exploded while the other, still standing, continues to decompose to this day as if frozen with its mouth open and only his immense tail is still moving, like a pendulum bewailing with convulsions of his now drowned purpose.  Wait… There is something else. A single ambitious mechanism. Clearly hidden, but an accidental insect might discern how it screams out in the open or target the cylinders in the white distance. Logic behind it dictates that in the immediate vicinity there is restless existence...

You find yourself in this prototype as anything and nothing, but you have a vague bond with a speck of land. Study around using the giant’s misshapen body parts formed on the surface.

 • Русское описание может появится в этом фрагменте, когда очи мои вдоволь насладятся рыцарским и жадным сном.

Controls: Click with the left mouse button to interact.

Управление: Левая кнопка мыши для взаимодействия.

 • A lottery for 10 days from scratch. This build was finished in order to participate in the 📯 SCREAM MACHINE 📯 jam and right now it is classically imperfect. So be prepared to find some bugs.

• Лотерея на 10 дней с нуля. Эта сборка была закончена в порядке участия в джеме 📯 МАШИНА КРИКА 📯 и на данный момент классически несовершенна. Так что будьте готовы обнаружить пару ошибок.

File list (prototype ver. 3.0.0): • Engine  • s_t_m • Manifest_NonUFSFiles_Win64.txt • s_t_m.exe
